{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    txt = ft.Text(
        value="こんちは！",
        size=20,
        weight=ft.FontWeight.BOLD,
        italic=True,
        color=ft.Colors.GREEN,
        bgcolor=ft.Colors.GREY_300,","
    )","
    page.add(txt)

ft.app(target=main)"],"caption":[]}

{"color":"default","parent":[{"annotations":{"bold":true,"italic":false,"strikethrough":false,"underline":false,"code":false,"color":"default"},"plain_text":"他コントロールと同じ役割･設定方法のプロパティ","href":null}]}

{"language":"python","parent":["import flet as ft

def main(page: ft.Page):

    tf = ft.TextField(
        border_color=ft.Colors.BLUE,
        border_width=5,
        border_radius=10,
        multiline=True,
        min_lines=3,
        max_lines=10,
        color=ft.Colors.BLUE_900,
        bgcolor=ft.Colors.GREY_300","
    )","
    page.add(tf)

ft.app(target=main)"],"caption":[]}
